scr.name: CAR SPAWNER
scr.desc: features all of game cars, bikes, boats, planes and helis, spawn what you want and where you want; has inbuilt vehicle preview; activation using CLEO menu.

scr.name: CHEATS
scr.desc: features all standard and bonus cheats, including 'mission skip' one; activation using CLEO menu.

scr.name: HEALTH REGEN
scr.desc: constantly regenerates few player's HP every second; autostart.

scr.name: FULL STATS
scr.desc: boosts all player stats to the maximum; autostart.
